short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple Chrome extension to help users find their default gateway IP address on various operating systems.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Default Gateway Helper is a handy Chrome extension that provides you with quick and clear instructions on finding your network's default gateway IP address on various operating systems, such as Windows, macOS, and Linux. Featuring a clean and easy-to-read design, this extension is ideal for users seeking quick information on how to find their network's default gateway.

In addition, Default Gateway Helper includes a direct link to Defaultrouters.com, a helpful website that assists you in finding login credentials, manuals, and other details for various router models. This extension is perfect for those looking to simplify the process of finding and accessing important network information.

Features:

Instructions for finding the default gateway IP address on Windows, macOS, and Linux
Clean and easy-to-read design
Direct link to Defaultrouters for easy access to additional router information
Usage:

Once installed, simply click on the Default Gateway Helper icon in your Chrome toolbar to view instructions on how to find your default gateway IP address on your operating system. You can also click on the "Defaultrouters" link to visit the website and gain further information on specific routers.
